title: ennuyirkk-uyirAgi
sahitya:
ennuyirkk-uyirAgi mannuyir anaittumAi irukkum parAparanE Om haranE


anupallavi

  unmayam Aghum ivvuDalaiyum uyiraiyum uLattaiyum manattaiyum anaittaiyum ElAi


caraNam    vAkkinil irukkinrAi vAimai pEshuvEn manattinil irukkinrAi malaraDiyE nEsippEn
nOkkinil irukkinrAi nOkkuvEn unnaiyE nUrAyiram vidamAi nuvaluvEn un pugazhE
